name: Alertes automatis√©es sur les nouvelles boursi√®res avec Google RSS, Gemini et notifications Telegram
description:
*Ce flux de travail contient des n≈ìuds communautaires qui ne sont compatibles qu'avec la version auto-h√©berg√©e de n8n.*

## üéØ Objectif
Ce flux de travail vous aide √† surveiller automatiquement les nouvelles li√©es aux actions, √† extraire le contenu principal, √† le r√©sumer √† l'aide d'un LLM (via OpenRouter) et √† envoyer des alertes en temps r√©el sur Telegram tout en les stockant dans Google Sheets.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne
### D√©clencheur
- Un n≈ìud Cron d√©clenche le flux de travail toutes les 15 minutes (ajustable).
- Le n≈ìud RSS Feed v√©rifie les derniers articles des alertes Google RSS.
- Le flux de travail filtre les doublons en utilisant Google Sheets comme journal.
- L'URL de l'article est envoy√©e √† l'API de lisibilit√© de Jina AI pour extraire le texte principal.
- Le contenu est r√©sum√© √† l'aide d'un mod√®le d'OpenRouter (par exemple, Gemini, Claude, GPT-4).
- Vous pouvez personnaliser l'invite pour correspondre √† votre ton et √† vos besoins d'analyse.
- Le r√©sultat est ajout√© √† un fichier Google Sheets.
- Envoie le titre, le r√©sum√© et la recommandation au chat Telegram.

**üßæ Mod√®le Google Sheets**
Cr√©ez une feuille Google en utilisant ce mod√®le : [Alerte Boursi√®re](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/109kj97ABR37XviIpxARCFviZwq8opOoe--rayOeFDSo/edit?usp=sharing)

## üß∞ Exigences
- Bot Telegram + votre ID de chat
- Compte OpenRouter et cl√© API
- Compte Jina AI pour l'extraction de contenu
- Compte Google avec acc√®s √† Google Sheets
- Flux RSS des alertes Google

## üõ† Instructions d'installation
- Installez les identifiants requis :
  - Ajoutez la cl√© API OpenRouter aux identifiants n8n.
  - Ajoutez le jeton du bot Telegram et l'ID de chat.
  - Ajoutez les identifiants Google Sheets.
  - Ajoutez les identifiants Jina AI.
- Cr√©ez ou copiez la feuille Google en utilisant le lien ci-dessus.
- Allez sur Google Alerts, cr√©ez des alertes et copiez l'URL du flux RSS.
- Remplacez les cl√©s API et les URL de remplacement.
- Ajustez l'ID de chat Telegram.

## üîê Remarque de s√©curit√©
Tous les identifiants sensibles (par exemple, cl√©s API, ID de chat personnels) ont √©t√© supprim√©s de ce mod√®le. Veuillez les remplacer en utilisant le gestionnaire d'identifiants n8n avant d'activer le flux de travail.

workflow.name: Automated Stock News Alerts via Google RSS, Openrouter & Telegram

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

parameters.content:
### ‚è∞ Scheduler

**Function:**  
This node triggers the entire workflow at a predefined interval. It ensures that the system checks for new stock news regularly without manual intervention.

**Configuration:**
- **Mode:** Every X minutes
- **Interval:** 15 minutes (default, can be customized based on user needs)

**Notes:**
- You can adjust the interval depending on how frequently you want to monitor news updates.

## üéØ Purpose
This workflow helps you automatically monitor stock related news, extract the main content, summarize it using a LLM (via OpenRouter), and send real time alerts to Telegram and store them in Google Sheets.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
### Trigger
- A Cron node triggers the workflow every 15 minutes (adjustable).
- RSS Feed node checks latest articles from Google Alerts RSS.
- The workflow filters duplicates using Google Sheets as a log.
- The article URL is sent to Jina AI Readability API to extract the main body text.
- The content is summarized using a model from OpenRouter (e.g., Gemini, Claude, GPT-4).
- You can customize the prompt to suit your tone and analysis needs.
- The result is appended to a Google Sheets file.
- Sends the title, summary, and reccomendation to Telegram chat.

**üßæ Google Sheets Template**
Create a Google Sheet using this template: [Stock Alert](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/109kj97ABR37XviIpxARCFviZwq8opOoe--rayOeFDSo/edit?usp=sharing)

## üß∞ Requirements
- Telegram Bot + your Chat ID
- OpenRouter account and API key
- Jina AI account for content extraction
- Google Account with access to Google Sheets
- Google Alerts RSS feed

## üõ† Setup Instructions
- Install required credentials:
  - Add OpenRouter API key to n8n credentials.
  - Add Telegram Bot Token and Chat ID.
  - Add Google Sheets credentials.
  - Add Jina AI credentials.
- Create or copy the Google Sheet using the link above.
- Go to Google Alerts, create alerts, and copy the RSS feed URL.
- Replace placeholder API keys and URLs.
- Adjust Telegram Chat ID.

## üîê Security Note
All sensitive credentials (e.g., API keys, personal chat IDs) have been removed from this template. Please replace them using the n8n credentials manager before activating the workflow.

parameters.text:
=Create a summary of up to 200 words from {{ $json.content }} Add a description of the affected stocks (stock code). Add a sentiment description (uptrend, downtrend, sideways, positive, negative or others). The writing format is as follows: Title
Category
Summary
Sentiment
Reccomendation. Write in plain text without punctuation, use emoji to more interactive.

options.systemMessage: You are a professional analyst who has studied a lot about stock movements. Use the following news articles to see the company's fundamentals, sentiment, and future projections.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet1

parameters.content:
### üì° RSS Feed (Google Alerts)

**Function:**  
This node fetches the latest news articles from Google Alerts RSS feeds based on specific stock related keywords.

**Configuration:**
- **RSS Feed URL:** Generated from Google Alerts using chosen keywords (e.g., `IPO`, `stock acquisition`, `company merger`, or specific company names like `AAPL`, `NVDA`, etc.)

### üîó Merge & Extract Real URL

**Function:**  
After collecting articles from multiple RSS Feed nodes, this step merges the data and **extracts the actual article URL**, since Google Alerts RSS provides redirect URLs (e.g., `https://www.google.com/url?...`).

**Processing Steps:**
- Use a **Merge** node to combine outputs from multiple RSS nodes.
- Use a **Function** node to:
  - Parse the `link` field from the RSS item.
  - Extract the real URL from the `url` query parameter of Google's redirect link.
- Save data to **Google Sheets**

### üìÑ Extract Content (Jina AI)

**Function:**  
This step extracts the **main content** (article body) from the real URL using **Jina AI‚Äôs article reader API**.

**Processing Steps:**
- Use an **IF node** to check whether the article already contains extracted content.
  - **If content exists:** Do nothing.
  - **If content is empty or missing:** Continue to next step.
- Use **Jina AI API** to extract the full article content from the `realUrl`.

**Output:**
- The full article text is stored in a field such as `extractedContent` or `fullText`.
- This text will be passed to the summarization step.

### üß† Summarize & Analyze (LLM via OpenRouter)

**Function:**  
This node uses a **Large Language Model (LLM)** via the **OpenRouter API** to summarize and analyze the extracted article content. The goal is to turn raw text into concise, actionable insights.

- You can customize the **system message** and **user prompt** to suit your use case.
- **Model**: Choose from a variety of models via OpenRouter (GPT-4, Claude, etc.).

**Output:**
- `summary`: A brief overview of the article.
- `analysis`: Optional insight or investment angle.

### üóÇÔ∏è Save to Google Sheets and Send to Telegram
This step saves the results of the summarization and analysis into the existing **Google Sheets database** to maintain a structured log of processed news.

### üì≤ Send to Telegram
Delivers the summarized news and analysis via **Telegram Bot API** for real-time alerts.

main.node: Append or update row in sheet1

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
